channel.title: Please help
channel.description: I often get this error in the server window while the others play : [CODE]java.lang.NullPointerException at stream.createFrame(stream.java:36) at client.logout(client.java:11994) at PlayerHandler.saveGame(PlayerHandler.java:397) at PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:389) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:276) at process.run(process.java:16) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (5351E8F3.cable.casema.nl) socket closed java.net.SocketException: socket closed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.fillInStream(client.java:10602) at client.run(client.java:20471) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/CODE] After that a few peeps get disconnected Does anyone know what is causing this?

item.title: Please help
item.dc:creator: @public_boolean public boolean
item.description:
@public_boolean wrote:

Which client is that with?

item.title: Please help
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

I often get this error in the server window while the others play :

java.lang.NullPointerException at stream.createFrame(stream.java:36) at client.logout(client.java:11994) at PlayerHandler.saveGame(PlayerHandler.java:397) at PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:389) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:276) at process.run(process.java:16) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (5351E8F3.cable.casema.nl) socket closed java.net.SocketException: socket closed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.fillInStream(client.java:10602) at client.run(client.java:20471) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
After that a few peeps get disconnected
Does anyone know what is causing this?
